item.description: #include <string.h>void foo(char *bar) { char c[12]; strcpy(c, bar); // no bounds checking for string length } int main(int argc, char **argv) { foo(argv[1]); return 0; } // 0x41414141 whoami ‚òØÔ∏è Everyone calls me Shanks, I’m currently completing my Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science.
